item.title: Bibimap
item.description: Ingredients Meat 100g meat 1 tbsp soy sauce 1 tbsp sesame oil 1 tsp sugar Â¼ tsp minced garlic Sauce 2 tbsp gochujang/doenjang 1 tbsp sesame oil 1 tbsp brown sugar 1 tbsp water 1 tbsp roasted sesame seeds 1 tsp vinegar 1 tsp minced garlic Veges (pick whats in season) mushrooms daikon carrots courgettes cucumber bean sprouts steamed rice seaweed
